name: Syobon Action NOSTALG
description:
----------------------INFORMATION:----------------------

Syobon Action Nostalg is a project based into a japanesse Super Mario RAGE fangame, where in all levels have traps and enemies.

This game pretend to be more or less the same 2D platform game but with new stuff that do it enjoyable and challenging at same time. New stuff like:

  • New levels and Environments
  • New gameplay
  • New items
  • New enemies
  • New traps
  • New cutscenes
  • New BOSSES
  • New PLAYABLE CHARACTERS

For now SAGE 2020 DEMO will include:

  • Tutorial level for those that never played Syobon Action
  • Totally Recreated levels from the original game + extended castle level
  • Only 1 Boss
  • 1 new level

----------------------SPECIAL THANKS:----------------------

Chiku:
for create Syobon Action and inspirate me to create this game

Many of the "I Wanna Community's members":
For loving and supporting my work since the game had only 1 level,. Actually feels me nice that people like them are there, thank you so much!

Some of the "Mario Fan Game Galaxy's members":
like in iwanna community, some in there supported the game's look. Even have tips for do the graphics better.

roaming97:
for helping me fixing my english

Sonic Amateur Games Expo:
thanks for give a chance to my fangame. I'll be more grateful if you success the demo XD
